## ITransformComponentFactory interface

Transforms components can define a factory / factories so that [ChartTransformFactory](./core.charttransformfactory.md) can automatically hook these up at run time. Usage not mandatory, transforms can be registered directly with the renderer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ITransformComponentFactory<TComponentRenderer extends TUnknownComponentRenderer> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [binderId](./core.itransformcomponentfactory.binderid.md) | symbol | Matches the transform to to the binders that it supports. |
|  [userTransformId](./core.itransformcomponentfactory.usertransformid.md) | symbol | Matches up with the user transform symbol id. |

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [addToChart(transformFactory)](./core.itransformcomponentfactory.addtochart.md) |  |
|  [createOne(binder)](./core.itransformcomponentfactory.createone.md) |  |
